title: Trash Cans & Bins
text:
Keep any space clean, organized, and hassle-free with our range of practical trash cans. Our collection combines durability and functionality to provide practical solutions for every environment. Discover versatile options designed to meet your trash needs, from indoor spaces to outdoor areas.

Selecting the right size trash can for your home depends on factors such as the size of your household, the amount of waste you typically generate, where the trash can will be located, and how frequently you plan to empty it. A compact trash bin may suffice for smaller households or spaces, while larger families may opt for a larger trash can to accommodate more waste between emptying.

Consider the dimensions and capacity of the trash can to ensure it fits seamlessly into your space and meets your needs.

For commercial spaces, check out our  office restroom supplies  and  cleaning carts  to manage trash while storing essential  commercial paper goods .

Our range of garbage bins is designed for versatility. We have trash bins for both indoor and outdoor use. Whether you need a garbage can for your kitchen, bathroom, office, or outdoor spaces like your patio or backyard, we have options for every environment.

The materials used in our outdoor trash cans are chosen for durability and weather resistance, making them suitable for various applications.

When shopping for outdoor trash cans, consider the specific needs of your outdoor space. For patios and backyards, you may prefer a trash can with a lid to keep the contents secure and prevent unwanted pests. You may prioritize features like ease of cleaning and aesthetics for indoor applications.

Many of our trash cans have features designed to combat unpleasant odors. Odor-resistant trash cans often feature lids with an odor seal that keeps smells securely locked inside the can. Some models are designed with ventilation features that help release odors when there’s no bag inside, preventing the buildup of unpleasant smells.

Explore our selection to find the ideal odor-resistant garbage can that suits your preferences and keeps your space smelling fresh.

Looking for more home goods to keep your space fresh and clean? Browse our selection of  cleaning chemicals .

Cleaning and maintaining your trash can ensure a hygienic and odor-free environment. Begin by emptying the trash can and removing any remaining debris. You can rinse the can with a hose or use a mixture of mild soap and water to clean the interior and exterior surfaces.

For stubborn stains or odors, a solution of baking soda, water, or vinegar can be effective. Be sure to dry the trash can thoroughly before placing a new trash bag.

Regular maintenance includes checking for any signs of wear or damage, such as cracks or loose lids. Replace any damaged components immediately to prevent issues with your trash can. Additionally, consider using  trash bags  that fit your can properly to minimize the risk of leaks and make emptying the trash easier.
